channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2024031435
item.description:
Report X-2024031435

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-01T03:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: SECAUCUS
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THREE AIR PACKAGES THAT WERE COLD TO THE TOUCH WERE GIVEN TO A RESPONDER TO INSPECT. THESE THREE PACKAGES WERE IN THE SORT WITH IDENTICAL PACKAGES THAT WERE PROPERLY MARKED AS CONTAINING DRY ICE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY ONE POUND OF DRY ICE COOLING COOKIE DOUGH. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGING. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS TO OTHER CONSIGNEES IN THE USA ARE 1Z2001630233569096 AND 1Z2001630218993218. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THESE PACKAGES WERE SHIPPED FROM NJ USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 200163, QVC / FAIRFIELD GOURMET FOOD, 11 CLIFFSIDE DR, CEDAR GROVE NJ 07009-1234.
